name: eduvision
description: Plataforma educativa inclusiva y accesible para todos los estudiantes

scripts.db:test: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const mysql = require('mysql2/promise'); mysql.createConnection({host: process.env.MYSQLHOST, user: process.env.MYSQLUSER, password: process.env.MYSQLPASSWORD, database: process.env.MYSQLDATABASE, port: process.env.MYSQLPORT}).then(() => {console.log('✓ Conexión exitosa a la base de datos'); process.exit(0);}).catch(err => {console.error('✗ Error de conexión:', err.message); process.exit(1);})"
